flavorText: The touch of an Eldrazi brings life and death in turn.

foreignData.flavorText: Die Berührung eines Eldrazi bringt abwechselnd Leben und Tod.

foreignData.text: Fahl (Diese Karte hat keine Farbe.)Wenn die Brüter-Drohne ins Spiel kommt, bringe einen 1/1 farblosen Eldrazi-Brut-Kreaturenspielstein ins Spiel. Er hat „Opfere diese Kreatur: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {1}."

foreignData.flavorText: La caricia de un Eldrazi trae vida y muerte, una tras otra.

foreignData.text: Vacío. (Esta carta no tiene ningún color.)Cuando el Zángano incubador entre al campo de batalla, pon en el campo de batalla una ficha de criatura Vástago Eldrazi incolora 1/1. Tiene "Sacrificar esta criatura: Agrega {1} a tu reserva de maná".

foreignData.flavorText: Le toucher d'un Eldrazi apporte successivement la vie et la mort.

foreignData.text: Carence (Cette carte n'a pas de couleur.)Quand le Drone incubateur arrive sur le champ de bataille, mettez sur le champ de bataille un jeton de créature 1/1 incolore Eldrazi et Scion. Il a « Sacrifiez cette créature : Ajoutez {1} à votre réserve. »

foreignData.flavorText: Il tocco di un Eldrazi dona prima vita, poi morte.

foreignData.text: Vacuità (Questa carta non ha colore.)Quando il Parassita Incubatore entra nel campo di battaglia, metti sul campo di battaglia una pedina creatura Discendente Eldrazi 1/1 incolore. Ha "Sacrifica questa creatura: Aggiungi {1} alla tua riserva di mana".

foreignData.flavorText: エルドラージの接触は生と死を一度にもたらす。

foreignData.text: 欠色（このカードは無色である。）培養ドローンが戦場に出たとき、無色の１/１のエルドラージ・末裔・クリーチャー・トークンを１体戦場に出す。それは「このクリーチャーを生け贄に捧げる：あなたのマナ・プールに{1}を加える。」を持つ。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — エルドラージ・ドローン

foreignData.name: 부화 드론
foreignData.text: 결여 (이 카드는 무색이다.)부화 드론이 전장에 들어올 때, 1/1 무색 엘드라지 자손 생물 토큰 한 개를 전장에 놓는다. 그 생물은 "이 생물을 희생한다: 당신의 마나풀에 {1}을 담는다."를 가진다.

foreignData.flavorText: O toque de um Eldrazi traz alternadamente a vida e a morte.

foreignData.flavorText: Прикосновение Эльдрази несет жизнь и вслед за ней — смерть.
foreignData.name: Дрон-Инкубатор
foreignData.text: Лишение (У этой карты нет цвета.)Когда Дрон-Инкубатор выходит на поле битвы, положите на поле битвы одну фишку существа 1/1 бесцветный Эльдрази Отпрыск. Она имеет способность «Пожертвуйте это существо: добавьте {1} в ваше хранилище маны».

name: Incubator Drone
originalText:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
When Incubator Drone enters the battlefield, put a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature token onto the battlefield. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."

rulings.text: Cards with devoid use frames that are variations of the transparent frame traditionally used for Eldrazi. The top part of the card features some color over a background based on the texture of the hedrons that once imprisoned the Eldrazi. This coloration is intended to aid deckbuilding and game play.
A card with devoid is just colorless. It’s not colorless and the colors of mana in its mana cost.
Other cards and abilities can give a card with devoid color. If that happens, it’s just the new color, not that color and colorless.
Devoid works in all zones, not just on the battlefield.
If a card loses devoid, it will still be colorless. This is because effects that change an object’s color (like the one created by devoid) are considered before the object loses devoid.
Eldrazi Scions are similar to Eldrazi Spawn, seen in the Zendikar block. Note that Eldrazi Scions are 1/1, not 0/1.
Eldrazi and Scion are each separate creature types. Anything that affects Eldrazi will affect these tokens, for example.
Sacrificing an Eldrazi Scion creature token to add {C} to your mana pool is a mana ability. It doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to.

Some instants and sorceries that create Eldrazi Scions require targets. If all targets for such a spell have become illegal by the time that spell tries to resolve, the spell won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen. You won’t get any Eldrazi Scions.
